findings.Description: IAM users with unused credentials for 90 days or more should be removed or deactivated.
Types: Software and Configuration Checks/Industry and Regulatory Standards/AWS-Foundational-Security-Best-Practices
findings.Title: IAM user has not used credentials for 90 days

findings.Description: Classic Load Balancers should have connection draining enabled.
Types: Software and Configuration Checks/Industry and Regulatory Standards/AWS-Foundational-Security-Best-Practices
findings.Title: Classic Load Balancer does not have connection draining enabled

findings.Description: Rate limiting rule exceeded with 5,000 requests from single IP in 5 minutes, potential credential stuffing attack.
findings.Title: WAF rule violations exceeding threshold
